def-en: A query that is posed to a link predictor in the form of an incomplete triple (s,p,?) or (?,p,o). The answer to this query is a node $o$ or $s$ that makes a complete and true triple out of the query triple
def-ga: Ceist a chuirtear ar réamhinsteoir nasc i bhfoirm abairte triaraí neamhiomlán (s,p,?) nó (?,p,o). Is é an freagra uirthi ná nód $o$ nó $s$ dhéanann abairt iomlán agus cheart as abairt neamhiomlán na ceiste.

prov.réamhsinint: féach ar an téarma 'link prediction (LP) / réamhinsint nasc (RN)'
prov.nasc: féach ar an téarma 'link prediction (LP) / réamhinsint nasc (RN)'

notes: Féach ar an téarma 'link prediction (LP) / réamhinsint nasc (RN)'
